title: Why is there a lower priority Q whenever you lag out?
body: Can you not set up something that shows whether it was lag or someone leaving? It's literal shit.

replies.body: Leaving a game still leaves your team down a player, which could change the tide of the entire match. The bigger question here is, "How can I fix this for you." So you don't get anymore Leaverbusters. I think it may benefit you to run through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664). If there is any issues with your client connecting to the Server that should eliminate the issue and voila, no more LPQ's.
